fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI

Interface MouseHandler<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of elements to be handle
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseListener

    public interface MouseHandler<I>
    The MouseHandler which will be called by the Arena in case of mouse events such as mouse click, drag and drop or mouse wheel move

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(java.util.List<I> items, KeyPress key)
      mouseClicked is called when a mouse click has been done.
      void mouseDrag(java.util.List<I> itemsDrag, KeyPress key)
      mouseDrag is called at start of a drag and drop event.
      void mouseDragging(java.util.List<I> itemsDragging, KeyPress key)
      mouseDragging is called during a drag and drop.
      void mouseDrop(java.util.List<I> itemsDrop, KeyPress key)
      mouseDrop is called when a drag and drop has been done.
      void mouseOver(java.util.List<I> itemsOver, KeyPress key)
      mouseOver is called with the elements available at the current position.
      void mouseWheelMoved(java.util.List<I> items, KeyPress key, int wheelRotation)
      mouseWheelMoved is called when a mouse wheel moved has been done.

    • Method Detail

      • mouseClicked

        void mouseClicked(java.util.List<I> items,
                  KeyPress key)
        mouseClicked is called when a mouse click has been done.
        Parameters:
        items - is the list of items available at the click position
        key - is the key pressed during the drag and drop from "CTRL", "SHIFT", "ALT GR" and "UNKOWN" (default)

      • mouseDrag

        void mouseDrag(java.util.List<I> itemsDrag,
               KeyPress key)
        mouseDrag is called at start of a drag and drop event.
        Parameters:
        itemsDrag - is the list of items available at the drag position
        key - is the key pressed during the drag and drop from "CTRL", "SHIFT", "ALT GR" and "UNKOWN" (default)

      • mouseDragging

        void mouseDragging(java.util.List<I> itemsDragging,
                   KeyPress key)
        mouseDragging is called during a drag and drop.
        Parameters:
        itemsDragging - is the list of items available at the current position
        key - is the key pressed during the drag and drop from "CTRL", "SHIFT", "ALT GR" and "UNKOWN" (default)

      • mouseDrop

        void mouseDrop(java.util.List<I> itemsDrop,
               KeyPress key)
        mouseDrop is called when a drag and drop has been done.
        Parameters:
        itemsDrop - is the list of items available at the drop position
        key - is the key pressed during the drag and drop from "CTRL", "SHIFT", "ALT GR" and "UNKOWN" (default)

      • mouseOver

        void mouseOver(java.util.List<I> itemsOver,
               KeyPress key)
        mouseOver is called with the elements available at the current position.
        Parameters:
        itemsOver - is the list of items available at the current position
        key - is the key currently pressed from "CTRL", "SHIFT", "ALT GR" and "UNKOWN" (default)

      • mouseWheelMoved

        void mouseWheelMoved(java.util.List<I> items,
                     KeyPress key,
                     int wheelRotation)
        mouseWheelMoved is called when a mouse wheel moved has been done.
        Parameters:
        items - is the list of items available at the click position
        key - is the key pressed during the drag and drop from "CTRL", "SHIFT", "ALT GR" and "UNKOWN" (default)
        wheelRotation - either -1 or 1 depending on the direction of the rotation of the mouse wheel
